step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists drawn in and muscles tight. Keep your shoulders stable.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms to shoulder height while exhaling. Relax your muscles.
Great job returning to the starting position with fists closed and muscles tight. Remember to inhale.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Exhale and relax.
You completed the first repetition smoothly. Keep up the good work.
Second repetition starting strong! Fists closed, arms in, muscles tight, and inhale.
Nicely done opening your hands and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles.
Good return to the starting position. Keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent extension and opening of the fingers. Exhale and relax.
You've finished both repetitions! Your movements were controlled and followed the instructions well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! You consistently closed your fists and tightened muscles while inhaling, then opened your hands and relaxed while exhaling. Keep up this excellent form for optimal lymphatic drainage.
